original_text: The doorposts of the nave were squared, and in front of the Holy Place was something resembling
korean_text: 외전 문설주는 네모졌고 내전 전면에 있는 양식은 이러하니

sentences.original_text: The doorposts of the nave were squared
and in front of the Holy Place was something resembling
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성소 앞에는 무언가 비슷한 것이 있었다
